goal.en: “The objective is to understand the basic conecpts, inorganic elements/metals, bonding theory and their physical ＆ chemical properties, and as well as their potential applications.“
goal.ch: 下學期之無機化學課程內容分三大部份；(一)主族化學，(二)配位化學、與(三)有機金屬化學。課程目標主要讓學生充份了解其中每一部份之基本觀念、化學鍵結理論、物理與化學性質、及其應用。重點力求突出主要化學性質及其與結構的關係，注重與理論部分相關內容的呼應，培養學生根據化學原理理解並靈活運用元素化學知識的能力。

content.en:
“The general scope of Inorganic Chemistry in this 2nd semester will be focused on three subfields: main group elements, transition metals and organometallic chemistry. The teaching contents will be concentrated on the bonding, structures, syntheses and their chemical and physical properties.
The main chapters will be covered as follows;
1. Chemistry of the Mail Group Elements
2. Coordination Chemistry I: Structures and Isomers
3. Coordination Chemistry II: Bonding
4. Coordination Chemistry III: Electronic Spectra
5. Coordination Chemidtry IV: Reactions and Mechanisms
6. Organometallic Chemistry
7. Organometallic Reactions and Catalysis
8. Parallels Between Main Group and Organometallic Chemistry“
content.ch: 無機化學下學期之範將含蓋課本從第八、九、十、十一、十二、十三、十四與十五章。第八章主要討論週v表中之主族元素，第九、十、十一、十二章將討論配位化學，第十三、十四章將討論有機金屬化學，第十五章將討論主族與有機金屬化學之平行性。

textbook.en: “1. ‘Inorganic Chemistry‘ by Gary L. Miessler ＆ Donald A. Tarr, 4th edition, 2011, Pearson, USA 2.‘Basic Inorganic Chemistry‘ by F. Albert Cotton ＆ Geoffrey Wilkinson ＆ Paul L. Gaus 3.‘Concepts and Models of Inorganic Chemistry‘ by Bodie Douglas ＆ Darl McDaniel ＆ John Alexander“
